content: शिल्पं [शिल्-पक्] {@--1@} An art, a fine or mechanical art; (64 such arts are enumerated). {@--2@} Skill (in any art); craft; पात्रविशेषन्यस्तं गुणांतरं व्रजति शिल्पमाधातुः <ls>M. 1. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Ingenuity, cleverness. {@--4@} Work, manual work or labour. {@--5@} A rite, ceremony. {@--6@} A kind of ladle or spoon used at sacrifices. {@--7@} Form, shape. {@--8@} Creation, procreation.
